definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: The downstream current was swift after the flood.
sentences.chinese: 洪水之后下游的水流很急。

sentences.english: The running water of the shower disguises your glory moans.
sentences.chinese: 水流声会掩盖住你的呻吟声。

sentences.english: Water passed through bottom discharges of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 水流通过电厂底部的泄水孔排出。

sentences.english: Filter can be fully restored after the Qing brush water flow.
sentences.chinese: 滤芯清刷后可完全恢复水流量。

sentences.english: The key of oxygen activation logging interpretation was water-flow velocity which determined every measuring point.
sentences.chinese: 氧活化测井解释的关键是确定各测点的水流速度。

sentences.english: Such a combination of fine screening and flow equalization is shown in Figure No. 26.
sentences.chinese: 图26显示了小格栅和水流均衡的组合状况。

sentences.english: Stone pulse water springs drop of sand, ghost light such as Chatham river.
sentences.chinese: 石脉水流泉滴沙，鬼灯如漆点松花。

sentences.english: The increase of the deepness of the tap hole will reduce the flow on the bottom of hearth.
sentences.chinese: 死铁层深度加大时，通过炉底的铁水流量减小。

sentences.english: Shallow streams make most din; still waters run deep.
The silt-carrying water gushes out of three specialised holes in the dam.
sentences.chinese: 这些夹杂着泥沙的水流从大坝的三个孔中被排出。

sentences.english: I weep for the drifting years.
sentences.chinese: 我为了似水流年而流泪。

sentences.english: But the influence of cooling water flow rate upon the condenser's TTD has a critical value.
sentences.chinese: 冷却水流量时凝汽器端差影响存在临界值。

sentences.english: This will suck air in as water drains during use.
sentences.chinese: 它的作用是在热水器使用中水流出的时候吸入空气。

sentences.english: When I got back to my apartment, I heard the water running. My wife was in the shower.
sentences.chinese: 到家后，我听见浴室里有水流声，是我老婆在洗澡。

sentences.english: Actually, there is a pipe hidden in the stream of water that holds the whole structure .
sentences.chinese: 其实，在水流中隐藏正一根水管支持着流水的结构。

sentences.english: Recalling the years flowing away as the music's slowly running.
sentences.chinese: 随着音乐的缓缓流动，仿若追忆似水流年。

definition: stream of water (as from a fountain or a faucet)/jet of water
to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
